name: MultiplyByConstant
doc: Multiply an image by a constant. The result is cast to the type of the input
filter_type: itk::MultiplyImageFilter<InputImageType, itk::Image< typename itk::simple::Conditional< std::tr1::is_same<typename InputImageType::PixelType, std::complex<float> >::value, float, double>::Type, InputImageType::ImageDimension>, InputImageType>

members.name: Constant
members.doc: The constant by which to multiply the input image
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set the constant that will be used to multiply all the image pixels

briefdescription: Multiply input pixels by a constant.
detaileddescription:
This filter is templated over the input image type and the output image type.
\author Tom Vercauteren, INRIA & Mauna Kea Technologies
This implementation was taken from the Insight Journal paper:http://hdl.handle.net/1926/510
\see  UnaryFunctorImageFilter
\li {ImageProcessing/MultiplyByConstantImageFilter,Multiply every pixel in an image by a constant}
